SourceString: Welcome to the Intercontinental Railroad Corporation!\nWhich station would you like to go to?\n<break>
So which station do you want to go to?\n<break>
I see you're quitting.\nWe look forward to using you again.\n<turn_end>
Hey? Customer\nIt seems like you don’t have enough money.
Hey? Customer\nIt looks like you don’t have enough money again.
...I can't help it.\nJust this time, right?
...There's absolutely nothing I can do about it.\nJust this time, right?
It's {Station_Name_Selected}.\nI'll give you {Gold_Need_Unpaid} gold along with the previous fare.\n<yesno><break>
Take care then.\nHave a nice journey!\n<turn_end>

What...Are you going?
``I don't know the details, but to that destination Only the people of Ethene can guide you. I heard that.
``If you are not a human, we cannot guide you. Please choose another destination.
Are you sure you want to go?\n<yesno><break>
Welcome home, {PC}.\nWould you like to return to your own time?\n<yesno><break>
Thank you very much.\nIf you want to go home, please feel free to call me anytime.\n<turn_end>

Oh? It seems that Mr. {PC} is not authorized to use
trains in our country.
Unfortunately, you cannot board at this station.
<turn_end>

Welcome to the Intercontinental Railroad Corporation!
Oh? It looks like you don't have an Intercontinental Railroad Pass. Unfortunately, you won't be able to board...
